data.name: ReadCashReceipt
data.value: select top(1) CRV_IDENTIFIER, CST_IDENTIFIER, CRT_IDENTIFIER, CASH_RECEIPT_ID from CKT_CASH_RECEIPT where CASH_RECEIPT_ID = @cashReceiptId

data.name: ReadCashReceiptDetail
data.value: select top(1) CRV_IDENTIFIER, CST_IDENTIFIER, CRT_IDENTIFIER, CRD_ID from CKT_CR_DETAIL where (CRD_ID = @crdId) and (@crtIdentifier = CRT_IDENTIFIER) and (@cstIdentifier = CST_IDENTIFIER) and (@crvIdentifier = CRV_IDENTIFIER)

data.name: ReadCashReceiptDetailStatHistoryCashReceiptDetailStatus
data.value: select top(1) CRD_IDENTIFIER, CRV_IDENTIFIER, CST_IDENTIFIER, CRT_IDENTIFIER, CDS_IDENTIFIER, CREATED_TIMESTAMP, REASON_CODE_ID, CREATED_BY, DISCONTINUE_DATE, REASON_TEXT from CKT_CRDTL_STATHIST where (@crdIdentifier = CRD_IDENTIFIER) and (@crvIdentifier = CRV_IDENTIFIER) and (@cstIdentifier = CST_IDENTIFIER) and (@crtIdentifier = CRT_IDENTIFIER) and (DISCONTINUE_DATE > @discontinueDate)
